dependencies: botocore (imported in /ai-gen-from-code-to-iac/workspace/607872658/function/ssm_backup.py; likely bundled in deployment package)
architectural_resources: AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store (reads parameters via SSM API: describe_parameters/get_parameters)
Amazon S3 bucket (writes JSON backups to s3://<S3_BUCKET>/backups/parameters-<timestamp>.json)
AWS KMS key (used for S3 server-side encryption via KMS key ARN env var KMS_KEY_ARN)
EventBridge/CloudWatch scheduled trigger (implied by README: daily execution)
IAM role/policy for Lambda (implied: needs ssm:DescribeParameters, ssm:GetParameters, s3:PutObject, kms:Encrypt permissions)
